hopobject.name: puppybits
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.1.3) Gecko/20090910 IceCat/3.5.3
hopobject.body:
The experiments of a lone programmer on this novel hardware, harking back to the Amiga days of raw system programming for the sheer joy of it.

Has or will have basic routines for the publicly documented major system components such as video, sound, mmu + cache, serial i/o, NEON, performance monitoring, and so forth.

This is a Free Software project for Free Software hackers, is written in C and ARM Assembly Language, and is covered by the GPLv3.
hopobject.shortdesc: Libraries, demo code, and experiments in bare-metal programming of a beagleboard for Free Software developers.
